statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={165.7}{e}^{{{0.0282}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements; round accordingly.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0282}}\approx{1.0286013841276}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0286013841276}-{1}={0.028601384127594}\approx{0.0286} and the percent is 2.86.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
